description.zh: 介紹高動態範圍數位影像的相關技術，包括高動態範圍影像攝影、物理為根據彩現、感知為根據壓縮呈現，以及相關技術所建構的感知忠實圖像環境於實務與研究上的應用。
description.en: Introduce the related technologies of High Dynamic Range (HDR) Imaging, including HDR Photography, Physically Based Rendering, and Perceptually Based Tone-Mapping, and their applications in research and practice.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理、物流、金流及通關等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course intends to discuss some important issues regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics environment around the world, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, performance evaluation and other global logistics related topics, like global supply chain management and global logistic flow. Besides, this course will provide the opportunity of case study for the purpose of emphasizing on both the theoretical and practical issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

name.zh: 產業政策與企業優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Industry Policy and Business Betterment

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，政府需訂定各項政策來因應潮流之變化並輔導產業更具競爭力。本課程將使EMBA學生了解政府相關產業政策，並透過一些成功案例探討製造業服務化、服務業科技化與國際化及傳統產業特色化等相關技術及對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, government often tries to assist industries to boost their competitiveness with various public policies. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest industrial policy plans and potential benefits on encompassing the creation of a service-oriented manufacturing industry, an internationalized and high-tech services industry and a specialty-oriented traditional industry. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生瞭解服務特性、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務創新和策略等，期望公司未來能成為卓越經營之企業。 課程內容包含服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Service management and innovation is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept, Service delivery system, Service quality, Service strategy, Service innovation, Customer satisfaction, and Case study.

name.zh: 顧客行為與互動行銷決策

description.zh: 顧客會購買某項產品，絕大部分的因素不是產品本身，而是「產品被賦予的意義」讓顧客認同。這表示，「與顧客的互動」，是交易進行的基本元素。電子商務的興起，讓互動行銷的重要性大增，透過網路，企業有了一個和顧客直接對話的空間。 這帶來的是機會，也是挑戰。本課程在互動行銷方面，強調以顧客行為為出發點，用溝通觀點及體驗行銷觀點發展互動行銷策略，課程將以哈佛個案教學方式為主。
description.en: Customer buying behavior on the interactive media is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, customer buying behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship. Harvard Business School case method will be used.

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以品牌理論來探討品牌行銷策略的重要關鍵議題。課程內容包含品牌特性、品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、品牌策略。身為公司品牌經營者，面對國際化與多變化的行銷環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, organizations, business. The topics covered in this class include: The nature of brand, brand marketing, brand competition, brand strategy. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand decisions under the internationalized and changeable marketing environment.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: 科研825選課上限40人黃葉達0.5

description.zh: Apple推出iPhone以及iPhone SDK 後，造成了一股不可擋的智慧型手機革命，由於相較於桌上型和筆記型電腦，手機是人們日常生活中更容易貼近使用的行動裝置，因此，手機中的App 更可以幫助人們解決生活中的問題。本課程將由最基本的入門點切入，前段會先帶領同學針對Objective-C 語法，委派設計(Delegate)模式等iOS入門的幾大難題上課，接著利用Storyboard建構出常見的iOS app 使用者介面，最後再教導同學用OpenGL es 實作有趣的3D 應用程式。本課程大致如下：1. 導論2. Objective-C3. iOS系統架構4.Xcode開發工具安裝與使用5.基礎UI設計與多國語言6. 核心應用程式設計7. 感應器應用8. 多媒體與相機功能9. OpenGL ES10. 擴增實境11. 專題實作及評鑑
description.en: In this course, you will get hands-on with the Apple SDK and learn how to use Objective-C to build the apps from scratch; You will be equipped to develop iOS apps, including 3D Apps through an understanding of the following course materials:‧Introduction to iOS‧How to program in Objective-C‧Using X-Code ‧The basics UI design of an iPhone/iPad application‧iOS MVC structure‧Use of sensors, the GPS, and cameras‧Multimedia functions – how to play audio and video files‧OpenGL ES for 3D/AR application‧Project Demo and Review‧How to publish an iPhone/iPad application

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與EMBA學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發EMBA學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange the ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以實務產業個案做探討。教學方式採哈佛大學個案教學方式進行。藉由分析研讀個案的學習機會，以激發出更豐富的管理創意，經由學習者的熱情投入和教師們的互動，使EMBA 學程的參與者將逐漸培養出分析和解決複雜問題的能力。除外，透過個案討論過程，使學生能於個案情境中學習相關產業及管理知識。
description.en: This course aims to explore the practical industrial cases do. Case teaching will follow Harvard University teaching manner. By analyzing the case study learning opportunities, the students will be stimulated in order to learn a more extensive management ideas. Through the enthusiasm of learners’ put in and the interaction with teacher, so that the participants EMBA learning process will gradually develop the capability to analyze and solve complex problems. Except through case discussions, so that students can learn in the context of cases related industries and management expertise.

description.zh: 本課程透過課堂演講，以講授最新管理知識或各產業之最新熱門管理議題，並透過學生分組研討使學生進一步瞭解經營管理的最新發展與趨勢。
description.en: This course focuses on lecturing, seminar, group study, and training of students' broad vision about the newly development and future trend of business management.

description.zh: 本課程介紹管理者或一般大眾在作決策時，會產生的心理偏誤。另外，本課程也提供管理者或一般大眾如何避孼心理偏誤，並改善其決策程序。本課程以心理學的角度來探討。
description.en: This course introduces how psychological biases affect individuals’ decision making processes. The psychological biases include excessive optimism, overconfidence, confirmation bias, illusion of control, representativeness, availability bias, anchoring, framing, loss aversion…etc. In addition, this course is also to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1)領導的基本概念；(2)中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3)領導的案例研究；(4)領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

description.zh: 創新管理課程主要對象為有興趣從事企業創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹基礎發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。主要內容包含如何辨識企業創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的創新工具或取更好的工作機會。
description.en: Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their entrepreneurial approaches to innovation.Objective: To develop an understanding of innovation toolkits and systematic innovation approach to help students making better understanding in innovation management and equipping with the innovation skills needed to pursue a viable career option.

name.zh: 企業資源規劃與財金資訊系統
name.en: Enterprise Resource Planning and Financial Information System

description.zh: 本課程探討企業資源規劃系統與財金資訊系統，其中包含企業資源規劃系統(ERP)中之配銷、生產製造與財務模組與企業供應鏈管理模組。本課程包含SAP ERP的實機操做、系統導入規劃程序、專案管理技術與ERP個案導入案例分享。本課程也探討各種不同型態的財金資訊系統，並介紹程式交易、演算法交易與高頻交易的主題與應用。
description.en: This course considers the enterprise resource planning (ERP) system and the financial information system. This course covers the three modules of ERP system, including the modules of sale and distribution, production and manufacture and finance. The course also contains the operation instructions for SAP ERP system, the process planning of ERP system implementation, the skills of project management and the case studies of ERP implementation. This course also covers the discussion of different types of financial information system and introduces concepts of program trading, algorithmic trading and high frequency trading.

description.zh: 本課程主要以近年國內外金融相關議題為主體，透過較嚴謹的研究方法，深入淺出地討論風險與報酬、金融危機與蔓延效應、效率市場、投資人的投資行為、行為財務、房價泡沫、金融機構的利潤與風險、券商利益衝突、政治與金融的關係等議題，並特別探討企業購併個案研究的主題。
description.en: This course aims at introducing financial issues including risk and return, financial crisis and contagion effect, efficient market, investor behavior, behavioral finance, housing bubble, profits and risk in financial institutions, conflict of interests of securities companies, and the relationship between politics and finance. Special focus on case studies of mergers and acquisitions will be provided.

description.zh: 研究期刊內容，針對學生之學習，提出研究心得閱讀報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metals and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

notes: 日間部與進修部在職專班合開

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉末冶金學"的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Topic of powder metallurgy.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 知識管理是二十一世紀知識與學習型企業發展知識經濟最主要的技能，而營建與土木工程是一個需要專業知識的技術型產業，故亦應融入知識管理之理念。本課程基於上述理念，分別介紹營建興土木工程之相關專業技能，知識管理與企業e化發展技術，進而探討營建導入知識管理之技巧與方法。
description.en: Knowledge Management(KM) is the most important technique of learning type business for developing knowledge economy in the 21st century.Construction and civil engineering need to conduct knowledge management due to they are complex and full with professional techniques.This course will introduce related professional techniques of construction and civil engineering,the development technology of knowledge management and a e business,also will illustrate the conducting methods of construction knowledge management.

description.zh: 山坡地開發、規劃與施工，高樑建築基礎施工與監測，水庫工程之調查與規劃，捷運系統規劃、調查與施工。
description.en: 英課名：The geography engineering case analyze        To open up and develop mountain slope, plan and         construction.        Base construction and to monitor of high beam         building.        Investigate and plan of reservoir engineering.        A rapid transit system plan, investigate and         construction.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

notes: 3/3~4/14週二上課；4/21之後改為週五上課

description.zh: 1.橋樑結構分析2.RC橋設計3.規範闡釋
description.en: Advanced Bridge Engineering 1.Analysis of Structures of Bridge2.Design of RC-Bridges3.Explanation of Specifications

description.zh: 本課程主要探討物業管理理論以及實際的操作手法。並結合現有的物業管理案例說明其實例運作方式在台灣的課題與機會。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the propertymanagement, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and  Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces.5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

notes: 建都所與在職專班合開

name.en: Special Topic of integration and application of Building Information Modeling (BIM)

description.zh: 建築資訊模型(Building Information Modeling)結合了建築設計、施工規劃、機電整合、生態節能以及美學等應用，是未來建築產業趨勢。本課程以BIM平台架構為中心，講述台灣建築產業面臨建築設計、施工、機電等多面向的整合。內容包括概念設計、建築設計、文件紀錄與施工規劃、建築與環境耗能分析以及環境控制等應用整合。藉由探討BIM的內涵、策略與技術，了解BIM在建築設計上的實際應用。並介紹演練REVIT 及ECOTECT兩種BIM軟體。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is an intelligent model-based process that provides insight for creating and managing building and infrastructure projects faster, more economically, and with less environmental impact. This course focus on introducing BIM system which includes a comprehensive portfolio of solutions for design, visualization, simulation, and collaboration that uses the rich information in the intelligent model to inform better decision-making and break down the barriers to better business.

notes: 建都所與在職專班合開

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一.孼疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與孼疫之關聯。二.家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三.醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四.日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include:(1)Immunology: to introduce the interactions between the immune system and the factors of sick building syndrome (SBS) and some specific pathogens.(2)Behavioral science: to investigate the influence of dietary and habit changes on environmental and human health.(3)Medical care: to introduce the difference and the response strategies between sick building syndrome (SBS) and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS)(4)Daily life: to investigate the influence of daily articles and resident behavior on environmental and human health.

notes: 建都所與建都所與在職專班合開、設計博班合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對流通業中各項經營管理項目作探討，其中包含設施位置選定，人力資源，流通規劃，及銷售促進等。此外，商用地理資訊系統之應用及個案研討亦包含在此課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the required management issues of retail business，such as location selection，human resource ，retail planning ，and marketing etc。Besides，at also includes business GIS and case study.

name.en: Intellectual Property Management for Global Brands

description.zh: 於高科技、知識經濟時代，作為無形資產之「全球品牌」，已成為促進公司價值及成長之引擎。此全球品牌大時代氛圍，「全球品牌」策略愈發重要。品牌策略管理在提供客戶認知、產品績效及企業價值。藉由品牌溝通，品牌創造客戶對品牌之熟悉及偏好，而達成商業管理目標，進而提昇股東價值及股價市值。本課程將就下列議題及知名品牌運作模式為說明：一、品牌發展策略，二、品牌價值，三、品牌商標保護策略(即1. 商標計畫，2. 商標執行，3. 商標控制）。四、公司治理與品牌管理。五、智財品牌授權。
description.en: In High-tech knowledge economy, as intangible assets "global brand", has become an engine for raising company value. During this global brand era, "global brand" strategy is important for enhancing customer awareness and business performance.  Through diversified brand communication, global brand creates customer familiarity and preference, and to achieve business goals, thereby enhancing shareholder value.The course focuses on the following topics: First, the brand development strategy, Second, brand value, Third, brand & trademark protection strategy. Fourth, corporate governance and brand management. .Fifth, intellectual property/brand licensing.

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 本課程內容含有: (1)簡介。(2)貯氫合金種類(3)貯氫合金結構與性質(4)貯氫合金製程---機械冶金(5)貯氫合金製程---真空感應熔煉(6)貯氫材料之吸放氫測量方法(7)貯氫合金應用(8)鎳氫電池材料(9)奈米碳材之結構與性質(10)奈米碳材之製程(11)奈米碳材之應用(12)氫燃料電池---質子交換膜材料(13)氫燃料電池---膜電極組材料
description.en: The class includes :1.Course Introduction, 2.Classes of Hydrogen Storage Alloys (HSAs),3. Structure and Properties of HSAs,4. Production of HSAs ---Mechanical Alloying Process,5.,roduction of HSAs ---Vacuum Induction Melting (VIM) Process,6.. Method of Measuring Storage Capacity for Hydrogen Storage Materials,7. Application of HSAs,8. Materials of Nickel Hydride Battery Electrode,9. Structure and Properties of Carbon Nano Tubes (CNTs), 10. Production of CNTs, 11. Application of CNTs,12. Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Proton Exchange Membrane, 13 Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Membrane Electrode Assembly (MEA)

name.zh: 進階穿透式電子顯微鏡學

description.zh: 進階穿透式電子顯微鏡學 1.內容簡介 2. 進階電子繞射及散射3.透鏡及孔鏡 4.設備原理 5.繞射圖案 6.菊池線之應用 7.收斂束繞射圖案 8.影像厚度及彎曲效應 9.缺陷及應力場之效應10.高解析度原子影像 11.電子能量損失能譜 12.試片製作
description.en: Advance in Transmission electron microscopy 1.Introduction 2.Scattering and diffraction 3.Lenses and apertures 4.Instrument 5.Diffraction patterns 6.Kikuchi diffraction 7.Convergent-beam techniques 8.Thickness and bending effects 9.Planar defects and strain fields 10. High-resolution TEM images 11. Electron energy-loss spectrometers 12. Specimen preparation.

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

name.en: Design of switching mode power supply

description.zh: 1.簡介2.功率級電路3.轉換器架構與分析4.控制電路5.回授電路6.保護電路7.電路佈局與機構8.應用電路分析
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Power Stage Circuit3.Converter Topology4.Control Circuit5.Feedback Circuit6.Circuit Protection7.Circuit Layout and Machanism8.Application Circuit

description.zh: 經由對環境問題的一般瞭解，研究現有之綠色設計政策、綠色設計管理及綠色生命週期設計。分析研究可行的方案來落實reduce, reuse 及 recycle （3R）三原則於產品設計程序之中。
description.en: A general review of environment issues and their problems followed by studies on green design policy, green design management, life-cycle design. Studies of exploring guidelines that lead to implementation of principles of reduce, reuse and recycle in process of product design.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.zh: 使用者經驗設計與評量

description.zh: 本課程將包含使用者經驗設計的基礎，以及使用者研究量測的內涵及方法。本課程中，將透過課堂上課、討論、以及實習的方式，介紹使用者研究的實際案例、評估模式、團隊合作方法、設計與評估工具、實踐思維、挑戰、以及實際執行的程序。預期學生將於本課程中，透過分組獲得使用者經驗在互動設計、空間設計以及產品設計上，有關使用者研究的設計、評估、施行、以及質化與量化分析量測評估的知識與方法。
description.en: This course will cover the fundamentals of user experience design and provide the students with insights into the measurement of user research. The real-life processes, challenges, considerations, tools, team works, models and case studies of user research are introduced in this course by lecturing, discussing and practicing methods. Students are expecting to learn user experience principles, to designing, evaluating, implementing and measuring user experience in both qualitative and quantitative methods in the aspect of interaction design, space design and product design individually.

notes: 103學年入學核心選修課程【停開】

description.zh: 剖析國內外在數位影像裝置的發展現況，以及未來的發展趨勢，並探討復合感官如何結合內在感知而在藝術性上產生的新變數。從未來資訊格式的發展、軟體的演化、媒體內容的整合等角度分析，並透過實測，探討複合影像媒體發展與應用的利基。熟悉After Effects 的應用領域(影視、遊戲的後製特效等)，與潛力，替代拍攝困難或危險度高的鏡頭加上結合3D 軟體製作的動畫加入一些先進的視覺效果。
description.en: Analyze the status of domestic and international developments and future trends in digital imaging installation, and explore how to integrate complex sensory perception and inherent experience in order to develop new variables in the art produced. Discuss from the future development of information formats, the evolution of software, perspective of media content integration, through some creative experiment, explore the benefit in the development and application of digital imaging media.

name.zh: 資訊視覺化設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程將介紹資訊視覺化設計與應用的原理與基礎。課程內容將包括:a)	資訊圖像及數位視覺的深入探討b)	利用電腦程式語言製作分析圖表、空間地圖及介面設計。c)	故事與應用主題的視覺化設計在本課程中，學生將學習如何有效的將資訊轉化為具視覺化美感的圖像，並從不同的案例分析中學會如何評估資訊視覺化設計作品與應用。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and basic of infographic design and application. It consists of following issues:a)	The deep study of information graphics and digital visualizations.b)	The use of computer program language to create charts, maps and user interface.c)	The illustrations design to tell stories and application implementation. In this course, you will learn to create effective and beautiful graphical displays of evidence, and to critically evaluate examples from case studies.

notes: 碩/博士生選修，使用設計館710室【停開】

description.zh: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul Saffo未來思考與趨勢前瞻，有助於讓每一位同學思索未來社會可能轉變得新趨勢和新的需求。無論同學希望學習或專精的技能為何，如何應用 該技能，提前 選擇一個在未來對社會或個人更可能有所助益的方向練習、實作，不斷繼續前進，才能夠將個人的意義進一步投射至未來的社會價值中；如此一來，未 來社會也將會給給予你應有的報酬。未來思考的課程，將師承奇點大學客座教授，同時也是美國史丹佛大學設計學院特聘助理教授 Paul Saffo 的 Forecasting 課程，內容將有 - 現況觀察、趨勢分析、未來事件辯論、未來趨勢矩陣圖、前瞻思考經典賞析（包含文章與電影） 等。
description.en: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul SaffoFuture Studies & Forecasting will be more and more important skill for every young generation students. What will the future look alike? What is the driving forces pushing us from current to the future? How many pace layers of future arrivals?In this class, we will discuss Stanford consulting prof. Paul Saffo’s Future Studies & Forecasting methods, by – Observing current trends, future event debate, Matrices and Axes of Uncertainty, future mindset developing, etc.

notes: 技職所與互動所合開，兩所各限9人

description.zh: 介紹服務設計之理論基礎及技巧工具以了解目前服務設計之發展現況, 並進行服務設計案例研討及實作以培養學生服務設計的知識與實作能力。
description.en: The fundamental theory and application skills of Service Design are to be introduced in this course. In addition, studies of practical cases together with the conduction of a practical service design project are designed to develop students’ abilities to deal with real world issues of service design.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(二)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(II)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

notes: 創新所與進修部在職專班合開(葉老師603、陳老師510)

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 21世紀雲端大數據快速運算，與有線無線高速傳輸的「雲通世代」，已帶領人類從工業量產的工業經濟時代，經由知識經濟，體驗經濟，進入了產業服務化，服務產業化，以顧客價值為道向的服務經濟時代。使用者體驗導向設計，與設計思考，己成為今日工業與企業經營教育重要的一環。本課程將以美國史丹佛大學D--School「設計思考」(Design Thinking) 的訓練模式為主軸，輔以左右腦活用的「創造力發展原理」，加上服務經濟時代，「服務設計思考」（Service Design Thinking) 組成本創意與創新思維課程內容。
description.en: In today's could big data calculation and high speed communication Era,  the changing of Social、economic、and technology，Forces human being has to transfer ，from mass production Industrial economic（Hard wear oriented)，trough knowledge economic 、experience economic， to today's customer oriented service economic（Soft wear oriented)。Human Centric Design & design thinking will be one of the key factor for today's industry and management Education。This course will base on the material and approach developed from Stanford D--School，and coop with creative engineering and the service design thinking，to form a Creative & innovation design theory and and project practice program。

notes: 創新所與工設四最後一哩合開限25人

name.zh: 創新講座－產品/服務創新實務(二
name.en: Innovation Lecture - product and service innovation Practice(二)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產業專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創產品與服務創新策略之實例教學，策劃符合技術發展企業「整合跨領域資源與知識」經營體質，並滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品及服務，使學術與產業互動交流縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course through lectures and conferences with industry experts, will also teach about existing cases of product and service innovation practice. aim to teach about solving the problem of economic development of Taiwan through the way and method of innovation design; and to plan out the “Integration of interdisciplinary resources and knowledge” operating conditions fitting with technology development enterprise and products according needs of markets and users. This course also aims to increase interactivities of academic and industry.

notes: ABC節6週工設二三四年級最後一哩與創新所合開

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(二)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(II)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

notes: 建都所與在職專班合開

name.en: Special Topic of integration and application of Building Information Modeling (BIM)

description.zh: 建築資訊模型(Building Information Modeling)結合了建築設計、施工規劃、機電整合、生態節能以及美學等應用，是未來建築產業趨勢。本課程以BIM平台架構為中心，講述台灣建築產業面臨建築設計、施工、機電等多面向的整合。內容包括概念設計、建築設計、文件紀錄與施工規劃、建築與環境耗能分析以及環境控制等應用整合。藉由探討BIM的內涵、策略與技術，了解BIM在建築設計上的實際應用。並介紹演練REVIT 及ECOTECT兩種BIM軟體。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is an intelligent model-based process that provides insight for creating and managing building and infrastructure projects faster, more economically, and with less environmental impact. This course focus on introducing BIM system which includes a comprehensive portfolio of solutions for design, visualization, simulation, and collaboration that uses the rich information in the intelligent model to inform better decision-making and break down the barriers to better business.

notes: 建都所與在職專班合開

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局
name.en: Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10.雲端運算之SaaS架構，11.實習課程與專題計畫。
description.en: This course focuses on information storage management, infrastructure, service management, security, and migration strategy for Cloud computing as well as the practice of cloud application through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization, 2. Business Continuity, 3. Storage Security and Management, 4. Cloud Scheduling, Performance and Security, 5. Virtualized Data Center building blocks - Virtual Compute, Storage, Network, Desktop, and Application, 6. Cloud Services and Management, 7. Cloud Computing Overview and Business Application, 8. Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. Retrieval Evaluation4. Text IR5. Query Languages and Operations6. Indexing and Searching7. Applications for IR8. Web Search

notes: 資工所、電資國際班與四資四合開

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義2. 電壓降與停電3. 電壓不平衡4. 電力諧波5. 頻率變動6. 電壓閃爍7. 暫態過壓8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

notes: 限修過電力系統課程者

name.zh: 積體電路實體設計演算法
name.en: Issues Related to Manufacturing and Reliability

description.zh: 介紹VLSI設計流程及技術地圖基本演算法分割平面規劃擺置、繞線(整體繞線、細部繞線)時脈及電線/接地繞線壓縮佈置後最佳化時序建模及最佳化訊號/電源完整性其它和製作及可靠度有關之議題
description.en: Design Flow of VLSI and Technology RoadmapBasic AlgorithmsPartitionFloorplanningPlacement and Routing (Global Routing, Detail Routing)Interconnection of Clock and Power/GroundOptimization for post-processingModeling and Optimization of TimingSignal Integrity

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 1. 解空間無限制之最佳化方法2. 解空間有限制之最佳化方法3. 線性規劃4. 牛頓法與最速下降演算法5.  LMS演算法與其衍生應用6. 人工智慧數值最佳化演算法
description.en: 1. Unconstrained optimization2. Constrained optimization3. Linear programming4. Newton and steepest-descent methods5. The least mean-square (LMS) algorithm and its variations 6. Artificial intelligent numerical optimization algorithms

description.zh: 企業倫理是企業經營本身的倫理，內容可以分為對內和對外兩部份。本課程將介紹：1、企業與員工間的勞資倫理2. 企業與客戶間的客戶倫理3. 企業與同業間的競爭倫理4. 企業與股東間的股東倫理5. 企業與社會間的社會責任6. 企業與政府間的政商倫理
description.en: Business ethics is the intrinsic value of enterprise. It contains two parts, inside and outside enterprise. This course will introduce 1. Ethics between employer and employee2. Ethics between enterprise and client3. Ethics between enterprise and competitor4. Ethics between enterprise and stockholder5. Ethics between enterprise and society6. Ethics between enterprise and government

name.en: Case Study of Corporate Merger & Acquisition

description.zh: 本課程個案研究目標公司包括科技公司與金融機構，可能牽涉之法律有：企業併購法、公司法、證券交易法、金融機構合併法、金融控股公司法、勞動基準法等。 本課程主要內容有1.概括併購政策議題。 2.併購交易的財務結構、會計、評價與法律議題。
description.en: This course covers several topics: 1. General policy issues surrounding mergers and acquisitions. 2. The financial structuring of the deal, accounting issues, valuation, and legal issues.

name.zh: 智慧財產權服務業商業模式
name.en: Business Model of Intellectual Property Service Industry

description.zh: 智慧財產權的應用由於NPE之興起，引起全世界的重視，歐美大公司視為未來重要策略。為了培養本國智慧財產權服務業，本課程將探討國際上近年來興起的智慧財產權各種商業模式，評估其優劣點及台灣可能發展應用之方向。
description.en: The application of intellectual property is a hot topic internationally. Especially, the rising of NPE litigation or other legal practices. In order to bring up the service industry of intellectual property in Taiwan. This course will emphasize the business model of intellectual property service industry worldwide. Comparison and application between Taiwan and other countries will be addressed.

name.zh: 時間序列分析與製程控制
name.en: Time Series Analysis and Process Adjustment

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於教導學生如何利用時間序列分析、品質製程管制、工程製程控制等方法來達成先進製程控制的目的。課程講述之內容包含下列課題:製程監控、製程調整、離散動態製程、時間序列模型、轉換方程模型、最佳回饋控制器、指數加權移動平均控制、遞迴式估計與自適應控制等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students a modern treatment of discrete-time advanced process control (APC) methods based on time series analysis, statistical process control (SPC) and engineering process control (EPC) for Quality Engineering in manufacturing. The topics that will be addressed in this course include:(1)	Process Monitoring; (2)	Process Adjustment;(3)	Discrete-Time Dynamical Processes; (4)	ARIMA Time Series Models; (5)	Transfer Function Modeling; (6)	Optimal Feedback Controllers; (7)	EWMA Control; (8)	Recursive Estimation and Adaptive Control.

description.zh: 本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
description.en: This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高等應用統計的相關原理方法與應用案例，包括一般資料分析、迴歸分析、時間序列分析、類別資料分析、樞紐分析、抽樣調查等。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: This course is mainly to learn some advanced methods of statistics and their application in business. The topics include general data analysis, regression, time series analysis, category data analysis, pivot analysis and sampling investment. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in applied statistics practice.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 本科目以跨學科多媒體的方式來探討不同媒介(與文類)的作品之間如何存在著啟發創意的連鎖反應，與創意激盪的引力關係，並探索何以同一時代不同的藝術形式之間展現出類似的創意主題與手法，進而形成時代的文化特色。以荷蘭畫家維米爾(Vermeer)的名畫「戴珍珠耳環的少女」為例，此畫作激發了作家歇維理(Chevalier)無限的想像空間而寫了一部同名小說，試圖去解釋畫作背後之奧秘。接著，受小說的激發，一部同名電影應運而生，把小說情節加以改編，並參考維米爾其它畫作, 試圖重現原畫創作時畫家個人、家庭與時代風采。這一連串連鎖激盪之下，不同媒介與文類的新作品出爐了，各有特色，而且彼此間還有相互連結和彼此評論的關係。有時候，類似的連結(可能在主題或手法上)普遍地出現在同一時代不同的藝術形式之間，這說明了此一連鎖與創意激盪的關係如何大規模地造成文化思想潮流與大眾流行文化。以「解構(後結構)思潮」為例，原本在哲學領域獨樹一格，進入文學批評理論領域後成為顯學，進而影響藝術評論與創作理念。後來更傳播至建築理論與設計，造成「解構建築」之流行與歪斜屋宇之誕生。儼然成為「後現代文化」的註冊商標。這一文化傳播的現象乃依賴前述之(1)啟發創意的連鎖反應，
description.en: This course adopts an interdisciplinary and inter-medium approach to understanding the cultural creation of a text.  The target is to investigate how a cultural/literary text is created in relation to, and in response to, another text in different media/genres, and how this "chain reaction" or "web of influences" displays a rippling effect that travels across the boundaries among painting, music, architecture, literature, and film.  For example, Vermeer's painting entitled "The Girl with a Pearl Earring" inspires the creation of a novel by Tracy Chevalier, which in turn facilitates the creation of a movie also with the same title. The case is the same with the musical piece of "Gloomy Sunday" which inspires the creation of many verbal/visual/audio art forms under the same title and even makes a social impact on increasing suicide cases.  These related texts form a "constellation" of "cycle," and certain ideas are so powerful that they permeate many genres/media at the same period of ti

description.zh: 本課程廣泛介紹社會語言學的各個次領域，目的在引導學生瞭解此領域早期的基礎研究與現代的關注議題。學生可藉此認識英語在社會上的運用以及各種社會變因對於語言運作的影響。修完本課程後，學生有能力辨認現代英語的不同語體、解釋語言使用所牽涉到的社會因素、運用社會語言學中適切的研究方法完成語言研究，並能將社會語言學的概念應用到語言教學。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive overview of sociolinguistic subcategories with the goal of introducing students to both early foundational work and current issues in this field. It provides students with valuable knowledge in the use of the English language in society and the effects of intricate social variables on language operation. Upon completion of this course, students will be able to identify the social varieties of English spoken in the present world, to explain the social factors involved in language use, to use appropriate methodology in sociolinguistics to conduct linguistic research, and to apply sociolinguistic knowledge to language teaching.

name.zh: 譯學新趨勢與翻譯實踐
name.en: New Trends in Translation Studies and Translation Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹20世紀90年代之後翻譯研究興起的「全球化轉向」與「社會學轉向」兩大新趨勢，並深入探討其對翻譯實踐與譯者專業素養所可能帶來的啟示。課程欲含括之翻譯議題如下：（1）全球化轉向-全球化與本土化張力、跨文化溝通、文化認同、權力關係、譯者中介、科技與翻譯、翻譯商品化、非專業翻譯；（2）社會學轉向-翻譯的社會因素（如社會制約與機制）、譯者的社會層面（如譯者角色、慣習與網絡）、翻譯過程的社會學研究（如品質管控、編修與團隊翻譯）。除論文之研讀外，亦將透過翻譯實例的分析（包括新聞、字幕、旅遊、廣告、網頁、商業與文學翻譯等實例），讓學生明瞭這些新趨勢如何引導翻譯實踐，並使其重新省思譯者的專業素養。此外，英漢/漢英翻譯實作與譯評亦為授課重點，期藉此協助學生與時並進，構思適切的翻譯策略。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the "globalization turn" and "sociological turn" in translation studies after the 1990s. An exploration will also be made into their possible implications for translation practice and the translator's qualifications. Translation issues to be addressed may include the following: (1) the globalization turn - the tension between globalization and localization, cross-cultural communication, cultural identity, power relations, the translator's mediation, technology and translation, the commoditization of translation services and non-professional translation (such as fansubbing and scanlation); (2) the sociological turn - socio factors of translation (e.g. social constraints and mechanisms), social aspects of the translator's profession (e.g. the translator's role, habitus and network), and the sociology of the translating process (e.g. quality control, revision and team translation). Through concrete examples of authentic translations, this course will enable s

description.zh: 1.結構之彎曲行為 2.幾何非線性問題介紹 3.彎矩再分配 4.非彈性結構分析 5.塑性分析 6.韌性設計特別要求 7.鋼筋混凝土梁之彎曲行為 8.結構在返覆荷重下之行為
description.en: The behavior of nonlinear structure1 Bending in structure2 Introduction to geometrical-nonlinear problem3 Moment-redistribution 4 Non-elastics structure analysis5 Plasticity analysis6 Flexibility design special request7 The bending of the reinforced concrete in beam

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 引介混凝土材料微巨觀性質、力學行為與新設計觀念。
description.en: (1)Basic Material Porperties-An Overview.(2)Coment Hydration and Microstructure.(3)Concrete Strength Development.(4)Creep and Shrinkage of Plain and Structural Concrete.(5)Durabiltiy.(6)High-Temmperature Effent:Design of Fire Resistance of    Concrete Structural Members.(7)Very Low Temperature Effects:Design of Concrete Vessels    for Cryogenic Liquids.(8)Linear Elastic Fracture Mechanics:tress Approach and    Energy Approach.(9)Special Type of Concrete Materials(High Performance    Concrete).(10)Micromecanics of Fibrous Composites-Elastic Modules and    Stress-Strain Relation Tensile Strength of Fiber    Reinforced Reinforced Composites.

name.en: Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering Slope Stabilization

description.zh: 生態工法的概念和原則近年來廣泛地引介和應用在各種的土木工程領域中，包括河溪、坡地、都市和交通建設等，而由於土石流和坡地災害的頻繁發生，因此在山坡地應用生態工法遂成為重要的課題，也逐漸成為應該提供給土木系學生，使其瞭解相關基礎知識的重要課程，因此在本導論課程中，我們將介紹如何將生物地工技術和土壤生物工程（Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering）應用在邊坡穩定和侵蝕控制上，使學生認識並瞭解目前在邊坡保護上結合工程力學分析、植物學知識和實際案例應用的發展，並藉此介紹國內外常用的邊坡穩定工法，以及結合不同傳統擋土設施的可行方式。本課程無先修課程限制，建議研究所和大學部高年級同學選修。
description.en: The concept and principles of ecological engineering has been widely adopted by various disciplines of traditional civil engineering,including hydraulic engineering, slope stabilization, urban infrastructures, and transportation engineering.  Among them, slope stabilization is a particularly important topic because of thefrequent occurrence of debris flows and landslides in Taiwan, and thus it becomes necessary to provide such a course to familiarize students with this important field.  In this introductory course, we will explain the fundamental concepts of biotechnical and soil bioengineering and how to apply them to the slope stabilization anderosion control.  An interdisciplinary approach that combines the knowledge and understanding of both mechanical design and vegetation properties will be emphasized.  The results can be integrated with traditional retaining structures to create more economical and eco-friendly slope stabilization systems.  No prerequisite.

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 認識科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

name.en: The Software of Electrical Design Automation

description.zh: 本課程在使學生熟悉自動化設計軟體之環境，方法及設計原則，（如高階語言程式設計及電腦輔助電路設計自動化軟體），內容包含（1）VB程式語言介紹 （2）VB之自動化設計領域之應用 （3）spice與pspice電腦輔助電路設計軟體之介紹及應用  （4）電路佈局自動化設計軟體之介紹及應用  （5）期末專題
description.en: This course is let students to familiarize the environments, methodologies and design principle of automation design software ( High level programming language and the automation software of computer-aid circuit design). They are including :1. Introduction to VB programming language. 2. The application of VB in automation design area. 3. Introduction and application for computer-aid circuit design software(spice & pspice). 4. Introduction and application for design automatic software of circuit layout. 5. Final project.

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

name.zh: 嵌入式即時多工核心開發與應用
name.en: The Development and Application of Embedded Multitasking Real-time Kernel

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式即時多工核心，瞭解其架構，並學習嵌入式即時多工核心之設計與相關應用技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹，(2)即時多工系統觀念介紹，(3)即時多工核心運作方式，(4)工作管理，(5)時間管理，(6)記憶體管理，(7)事件管理，(8)於嵌入式系統建制即時多工核心。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded multitasking real-time kernel.  They will parse the structure of multitasking real-time kernel; learn the skill to design the embedded multitasking real-time kernel and the application technology.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded system introduction, (2)Multitasking real-time concept, (3)Kernel structure, (4)Task management, (5) Time management, (6)Memory management, (7) Event management, (8)Real-Time kernel porting.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

notes: 車輛所與碩士在職專班合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與Z-轉換2. 取樣原理3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換4. 數位濾波器系統設計5. 同位訊號處理6. 時變訊號處理-短時域傅式轉換7. 離散時間隨機程序8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

name.en: The Architecture and the Urban Microclimate

description.zh: 納入「都市微氣候」的考量，是現階段精進建築設計與提升建築效能的關鍵手段之一；回饋在生活舒適度的感受、居住安全度的維護以及省能節電度的落實等面相，都可得到具體且顯著的成效。掌握都市微氣候的特徵型態與變化脈動，擬判對建築安排可能肇致的影響及干擾，透過自然循環的流場機制及量場管制，找到本土建築規劃之最佳改善設計策略。
description.en: Bringing the “Urban Microclimate” into consideration is one of the key methods to enhance architectural design and upgrade building effectiveness at the present time; it can get feedbacks in many aspects such as feelings of cozy life, maintenance of residential safety , and to carry out the energy-saving.  Holding the features and changes of the Urban Microclimate, analyzing the potential affect and disturb for architecture, through the control mechanism of natural circulation in order to find the best strategy for local design enhancement.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.
