description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 本課程由ERP概論談起，介紹完整的ERP架構及涵蓋的模組，以及企業規劃及導入ERP的過程，最後結合案例介紹、並探討從ERP到企業的e化等主題，期許同學完成本課程後能了解並運用ERP。
description.en: This course begins with a brief introduction of ERP, followed by a comprehensive discussion on the system architecture, functions, and modules of ERP. Also covered in the course is the process of planning and introducing ERP in enterprises. Real-world cases of ERP and e-Business will be provided in the course.

notes: 科技大樓240電腦教室【停開】

description.zh: 軟體在其整個生命週期中要維持「健康」，必須要能確保需求做對(Right)、品質做好(Good)、以及使用上可被依恃 (Dependable)。在軟體工程領域中，軟體生命週期管理(Software Lifecycle Management, SLM)是確保軟體健康的具體作法。本課程將涵蓋軟體昇命週期管理的主要議題、實務作法、與工具，並以案例具體說明。1	軟體的生命週期2	軟體生命週期管理的挑戰3	軟體生命週期管理實務作法4	軟體生命週期管理平台與工具5	軟體生命週期管理案例
description.en: To ensure that software stays healthy through its lifetime, the development team must work to guarantee that the requirements are correctly implemented, that software quality is good, and that the software product is dependable in its use. Software lifecycle management seeks to bring forward such guarantees. In this course, the main issues, challenges, best practices, tool supports, and some illuminating case studies are covered.1	Software lifecycle management2	Challenges of software lifecycle management3	Best practices for software lifecycle management4	Platforms and tool supports for software lifecycle           management5	Case studies

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式， Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Fourier Series 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling 2.Frequcy response of discrete time system 3.IIR digital filter design 4.FIR digital filter design 5.Discrete Fourier transform 6.Fast Fourier transform

notes: 電資國際專班與資工所合開

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，包括一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。以提升實驗效率及品質。
description.en: This course aim to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor experiment, two-factor experiment, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

notes: 資源所與在職專班合開【停開】

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 選習本課程應具有普化及一般有機化學知識，此課程主要講授環境上（尤其是應用在工程上）有關的有機化學專業知識，其主要內容包括：１.有機物種與特性２.有機物之基本化學反應３.有毒（害）有機物之處理原理４.環境有機物之代謝與循環機制５.環境荷爾蒙之化性６.微量有機物之採樣分析原理
description.en: Based on general chemistry, the course provides professional knowledge on the organic chemistry in the environment. It includes the following major items：1.Characteristics and classification of organics.2.Fundamentals of chemical reaction for organics.3.Mechanics of cycling and metabolism of organics in the environment.4.Chemical properties of environmental Hollomans5.Theory of treatment for hazardous organics.6.Principle of sampling and analysis for micro-organics in the environment.

notes: 與資源所陳老師合開(教室:億光大樓13樓1343研討室)

description.zh: 本課程著重在協助企業如何在國際間綠色浪潮的衝擊與永續發展三重盈餘之二十一世紀新經濟中競存，並能與全球永續發展的理想共存共榮。換言之，本課程主要是協助企業如何透過環境的議題，將原本可能的威脅課程轉換成機會。課程內容包括：企業環境管理與永續發展的內涵、企業環境風險管理與預防、整合性企業環境管理的做法、綠色行銷與永續消費、綠色產品設計、環境會計、環境資訊的揭露與報告、企業社會責任的內涵及做法，以及其他企業綠化的做法。
description.en: This course focuses on strategically assisting enterprises to improve their competitiveness through environmental issues while striving for sustainability in the 21st century. The contents of the course will be covering overview of corporate environmental management and sustainable development, corporate environmental risk management and prevention, green accounting, green marking and sustainable consumption, corporate social responsibility, corporate environmental disclosure and reporting, and some other subjects related to the greening of the business.

description.zh: 本課程內容乃在引導學習者了解環境保護之實務範疇，以環境污染類別(空氣、水、廢棄物、土壤及地下水、毒物學等領域)及職場工作屬性(工程師、專案規劃、研究人員、公務人員、教育推廣等)不同面向來介紹。課程中將安排各環境領域專業人員進行其實務工作性質講解，並規劃至產業界、公家機關、學術研究及其他單位進行實務參訪，俾使學生了解環境保護不同工作特性現況及其所需具備的內涵，並熟悉職場組織特性，拓展視野，以充實進入社會所需具備之技能。
description.en: This course will introduce practical work of environmental protection, including different aspects of environmental quality and relative job descriptions. Lectures and discussions with respect to professional persons from industry, consulting business, research institute, government and social association will be arranged. Student’s more understanding about skills and abilities needed in the real work of environmental protection is anticipated.

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論,線性規劃法,非線性規劃法,多目標函數最佳化,近代數學規劃法介紹,精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts,Linear progrsmming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques,Optimum design of precision machine components and systems.

notes: 英語授課 綜科B05-1上課

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

notes: 博士班(前十二週與碩班合上,後六週碩博分開上)

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

notes: 化工所必修、生化所選修(化工生化合開)

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

notes: 建都所與在職專班合開

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.電磁波在介質中的傳導 2.光纖光學 3.光纖種類及特性 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.光纖通訊系統 8.光纖網路
description.en: 1.Electromagnetic ware propagation in media 2.Fiber optics 3.Characteristics of optic fibers 4.Optical emitter 5. Optical receiver 6.Repeater and optical amplifier 7.Optical fiber communication 8.Optical fiber network

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1.單晶的生長 2.磊晶技術 3.擴散與離子植入 4.乾式及溫式蝕刻 5.化學蒸氣沈積法 6.金屬薄膜技術 7.光電元件製程 8.元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

notes: 四光四與光電所合開(億光1035)

name.en: Special Topics on Geographic Information System

description.zh: 本課程重點在訓練學生如何學習使用地理資訊系統的軟硬體設備，作為空間規劃與設計決策支援的工具。內容涵蓋相關理論及實務，範圍包括：一、	地理資訊系統的定義與發展二、	地理資訊系統的架構與功能三、地理資訊系統在空間規劃與設計上之應用四、地理資訊系統相關軟體之操作五、實務應用
description.en: The course designed is to help students to utilize the GIS environments to produce a better decision-making when dealing with space planning and design issues. Both related theories and applications of GIS are introduced.  The content of the course include:1.The definition and development of GIS2.The mainframe and functions of GIS3.The applications on space planning and design of GIS4.The introduction and operation of GIS software5. Applications practice.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul Saffo未來思考與趨勢前瞻，有助於讓每一位同學思索未來社會可能轉變得新趨勢和新的需求。無論同學希望學習或專精的技能為何，如何應用 該技能，提前 選擇一個在未來對社會或個人更可能有所助益的方向練習、實作，不斷繼續前進，才能夠將個人的意義進一步投射至未來的社會價值中；如此一來，未來社會也將會給予你應有的報酬。未來思考的課程，將師承奇點大學客座教授，同時也是美國史丹佛大學設計學院特聘助理教授 Paul Saffo 的 Forecasting 課程，內容將有 - 現況觀察、趨勢分析、未來事件辯論、未來趨勢矩陣圖、前瞻思考經典賞析（包含文章與電影） 等。
description.en: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul SaffoFuture Studies & Forecasting will be more and more important skill for every young generation students. What will the future look alike? What is the driving forces pushing us from current to the future? How many pace layers of future arrivals?In this class, we will discuss Stanford consulting prof. Paul Saffo’s Future Studies & Forecasting methods, by – Observing current trends, future event debate, Matrices and Axes of Uncertainty, future mindset developing, etc.

notes: 博碩課程, 與互動所合開

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意.類神經網路介紹: 演算法,應用,與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合,近似推理理論,模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

name.zh: 醫療器材開發數位化工程
name.en: Digital technology on medical device development

description.zh: 本課程目的在使學生了解醫療器材數位化發展趨勢，課程中透過介紹牙科及骨科等相關領域之應用。結合醫學資訊與3D 影像處理進行產品設計與創新製造工程，也是學習之重點。
description.en: Course purpose:To describe how to use 3D image information in medical device field, To use direct manufacturing technology in medical treatment, To know the current industrial trend.

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 機電所、製科所與自動化所合開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程介紹許多有關於組織中的個人、團隊與組織交互作用的研究。明確地說，本課程內容主要在探討如何改善員工績效與利社會行為，降低缺勤與離職率，以及提高工作滿足與組織承諾等員工態度。
description.en: This course introduces a variety of researches that investigates the interactions between individuals, groups, and organization. Specifically, it focuses on how to improve employee performance and prosocial behaviors, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and enhance job attitudes such as job satisfaction and organizational commitment.

description.zh: 本課程主要運用最佳化方法解析動態成長、風險檢測、供應鏈調控等管理與決策問題，探討的主題包括：環球供應鏈問題、投資組合問題、生產規劃、配送規劃、排程規劃等。
description.en: This course mainly talks about how to use optimization methods to analyze the management and decision making problems such as dynamic growth, risk evaluation, and supply chain adjustment etc. The topics to be discussed include: 1.global supply chain management; 2.portfolio selection problems; 3.production planning; 4.distribution and transportation planning; 5.scheduling problems.

description.zh: 本課程利用要徑法教導學生管理一項專案有關時間及成本的估計，進度表，預算編列等技巧，及其它監督控制一項專案進行之措施。專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。課程內容包含：（1）專案的定義和辨認，（2）專案可行性研究和選擇條件，（3）專案進度表編排，（4）專案之預算與成本控制，（5）限制性資源之編排與調配，（6）專案評核與檢討技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the technique of Critical Path Method (CPM) to manage a project in terms of time / cost estimation, scheduling, budgeting, and other control / monitoring measures on the performance of a project. The role of project manager in an organization will also be discussed. Topics to be covered are: (1) Concept and identification of a project, (2) Project feasibility study and selection criteria, (3) Project scheduling, (4) Budgeting and cost control, (5) Constrained resource scheduling and leveling, and (6) Project evaluation and review technique.

name.zh: 企業經營效率模型分析

description.zh: 企業經營效率評估為管理控制之必要程序，經由績效評估可以建立有效的回饋系統，進而改善各項目之資源使用情況。本課程介紹如何以資料包絡分析進行績效評估的概念及方法，並提供合法完整版自由軟體供學生實地操作，本課程強調理論與實作並重，使學生熟悉DEA理論，並以電腦套裝軟體的實際運算，探討各種實證研究上的應用。
description.en: The study of performance management aids in motivation, employee development and productivity improvement to meet organization goals. This course includes an overview of how performance works to align with the strategic goals of an organization. Specifically, DEA models are used to conduct a sophisticated analysis of the productivity and efficiency, and to show how data analysis forms the information base for compensation and performance appraisal processes. As we study the analytical techniques we shall also examine a wide variety of empirical applications.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討服務科學之各項議題，包含服務科學導論、服務相關政策及法律、服務科技、服務經濟、服務設計、服務工程、服務科學個案等。
description.en: This course is to investigate several key issues on service science, such as introduction to service science, service policy and law, IT application in service, service economy, service design, service engineering, service science cases.

name.zh: 營運模式與供應鏈管理
name.en: Business Model and Supply Chain Management

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對營運模式與供應鏈管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6.商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the business model and supply chain management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management 2.The business model3. Business reengineering 4.Enterprise resource planning 5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business 7.Supply chain management 8.Demand chain management9.Collaborative.

description.zh: 本課程能讓學生了解各種產業相關個案研究。個案涵蓋國內外企業案例。資料來源包含哈佛大學個案、光華基金會個案、及其他相關發表之個案資料。本課程希望學生能透過此案例討論以瞭解產品實務之營運。
description.en: This course will cover the case study related to the management of all industries. The cases will be from international and local enterprise. The teaching material will be from Harvard University case, KMCC case, and other public case. The purpose this course is to provide students a practical indusyries’ scenario.

notes: 經管三、經管四與經管所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要了解行銷研究的本質與特性，掌握行銷研究要領，進而具備規劃與執行行銷研究的能力，包含下列：行銷研究的環境與基本觀念，網路資料庫介紹，資料蒐集模式與方法，問卷設計與抽樣，量表製作，資料分析，研究成果呈現與溝通。
description.en: This course aims to help participants understand the nature and features of marketing research, realize how to conduct marketing research, and develop a toolset for the planning and implementation of marketing research. It has the followings: Background of Marketing Research, Introduction to Marketing Research, Database and Data Collection: Types and Methods, Measurement Instruments and Sampling, Data Analysis, Communicating with Research Users.

name.zh: 雲端軟體即服務系統開發與設計實
name.en: Practice of SaaS Application Development and Design

description.zh: 本課程旨在培育雲端SaaS系統開發與設計人才，訓練學生應用ICE平台進行軟體服務的開發與實做。課程內容含蓋了：軟體產業論述、軟體需求工程、軟體設計、資料導向系統設計、文件管理系統設計、報表管理系統設計、雲端資料轉移策略及雲端行動策略等議題。本課程理論與實務並重、實務案例研討及實務操作練習也將為本課程重要之一環。
description.en: This course intends to introduce essential topics regarding to software application as service (SaaS). The students are trained to design and implement mobile applications via ICE platform. There are several topics, including: software industry introduction, requirements engineering, software design data-driven application, document management application, report management application, data migration in cloud and the mobile solution (& strategy) in cloud. This course focuses on both theoretical and practical issues. Real world case study and hands-on practice will also be important parts of this course.

notes: 資財所與最後一哩合開限40人，科技大樓240電腦教室

description.zh: 1.光的電磁理論回顧2.光學系統光束追跡3.高斯光學4.共振腔理論5. 原子輻射6.雷射振盪與放大7.雷射種類與應用
description.en: 1.Review of Electromagnetic Theory2.Ray Tracing in Optical System3.Gaussian Beams in Optical Media4.Optical Resonator and Cavity Theory5.Atomic Radiation6.Laser Oscillation, Amplification, and Excitation7.Laser Characteristics, Category, and Applications

notes: 四光四與光電所合開，億光1115會議室上課

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 本課程著重在協助企業如何在國際間綠色浪潮的衝擊與永續發展三重盈餘之二十一世紀新經濟中競存，並能與全球永續發展的理想共存共榮。換言之，本課程主要是協助企業如何透過環境的議題，將原本可能的威脅課程轉換成機會。課程內容包括：企業環境管理與永續發展的內涵、企業環境風險管理與預防、整合性企業環境管理的做法、綠色行銷與永續消費、綠色產品設計、環境會計、環境資訊的揭露與報告、企業社會責任的內涵及做法，以及其他企業綠化的做法。
description.en: This course focuses on strategically assisting enterprises to improve their competitiveness through environmental issues while striving for sustainability in the 21st century. The contents of the course will be covering overview of corporate environmental management and sustainable development, corporate environmental risk management and prevention, green accounting, green marking and sustainable consumption, corporate social responsibility, corporate environmental disclosure and reporting, and some other subjects related to the greening of the business.

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源(如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源(如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等)及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電腦在工程設計應用為主，內容有電腦輔助繪圖含電腦三維實體模型建立、電腦模擬、最佳設計、有限元素分析等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided engineering techniques applied in mechanical engineering design. The course contents will include topics on computer aided design and draft including the creation of 3D solid model, computer simulation, Optimization technique, and finite element analysis techniques

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

notes: 限博士班 綜科館708室

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 從設計產業經營之立足點探討經典服務理論如：服務品質、服務設計與服務體驗工程（S.E.E.）之應用與實踐。授課內容側重於基礎服務理論與最新服務科學方法的介紹，並選擇特定服務產業進行實務研習對象。課程預計以主題講授、專家座談、分組研習方式進行，並分三期評量服務研習成果。
description.en: The course aims at the training of applying prominent service theories and methods such as Service Quality, Service Design, Service Experience Engineering (S.E.E.) to the management of design service. It proceeds in the forms of topics lecturing, professional speeches and groups study. The result of study is evaluated in three stages accordingly.

description.zh: 本課程介紹產品介面設計之系統性實務。產品介面設計面臨使用者多樣化與介面日趨複雜的挑戰，設計者必須憑藉精確的方法才能掌握設計的易用性。各種方法包括：使用者需求探討、使用性分析、解決方案評估、實驗模型製作、使用者測試等。其中使用性測試係模擬介面與使用情境，藉由觀察與記錄挖掘操作過程之經驗，其中包括操作錯誤、使用疑惑、使用挫折、使用效率與使用滿意度。本課程將介紹上述各種方法及理論，並以案例引導學習者思考與操作。
description.en: This course is to introduce a practical and systematic way to deliver a product that works for users. It is a methodical approach involves several methods, including gathering requirements, analyzing usability problems, evaluating design alternatives, proposing solutions, developing and testing prototypes, and testing a interface with users. The goal of usability testing is to uncover problems that users may encounter so those problems can be fixed. Testing may include collecting data on the paths users take to do tasks, the errors they make, when and where they are confused or frustrated, how fast they do a task, whether they succeed in doing the task, and how satisfied they are with the experience. Case studies and practice will be carried out with illustration and discussions.

description.zh: 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之研  究.
description.en: This course provides study of design-ergonomics related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計創造力開發、創意設計手法與設計方法論等主題之碩士論文研究或實務專題設計，提供各種理論工具與個案演練。課程內容包括(1)人工智慧、心理學、人類學和語言學等導向之設計創造力研究，以及(2)規則式與案例式推理、基模類比與聯想、產品俗民誌、模式語言和體驗劇本等創意設計手法演練。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the graduate students whose topics of master's theses or graduate projects are related to creativity development, creative design skills and methodology, to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case studies, and its contents contain (1) design creativity research based on artificial intelligence, psychology, anthropology and linguistics, as well as (2) exercises of creative design techniques: rule-based reasoning and case-based reasoning, schematic analogy and association, product ethnography, pattern language and experiential scenario.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

description.zh: 本科目主旨在於加強學生使用語言的表達能力、並促使學生更加容易瞭解學術論文。每週的課程是由一系列連貫性的論文來引導學生去學習即分析論文，並能以口語、寫作正確地表達出所分析論文的含義。這些所提供的研究論文都具備可精闢分析的要素。這些文章的內容有包含習慣的不同、事件的相對面、意見的分歧、喜好的差異、演繹法即歸納法得的結論等等。
description.en: This course aims to enhance oral and written communication skills and in the process provide a greater understanding of the philosophy underlying academic discourse. Weekly units are oriented around a progressive series of tasks which consider academic texts in context and require learners to understand, analyse and produce spoken and written texts appropriate to the context of academic English. The contextualisation of these tasks is the philosophical aspects of critical analysis. Themes, such as the difference between convention, fact, opinion and preference; deductive and inductive proof; validity and truth; evidence; and the ethics of persuasion, are the basis on which the skills are taught.

description.zh: 此課程係提供對不織布學之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。課程包括所有不織布製造方法與其在工業領域上之應用，包括有短纖維網、長絲網、濕式纖維網之製造方法；纖維網之物理強化方法，纖維網之化學強化方法；不織布、薄膜、梭織物與針織物之疊層方法；微細與超微細粒子在不織布上之應用；不織布之印染與整理加工；不織布在電子、航太、醫學材料及人工皮革上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of Non-woven materials. The course covers all aspects of Non-woven manufacturing methods, as well as their applications in industry. They include manufacturing methods of; fibrous web filament web wet method; physically bonded, chemically bonded or methods; lamination among the film, woven, knitted and Non-woven fabrics; use of fine and superfine particle in Non-woven industry; Printing and Finishing for Non-woven; use of Non-woven in electronics aerospace, medical materials and artificial leather..…etc.

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.傅立葉分析 3.微波網路 4.向量網路分析儀 5.頻譜分析儀6.時域反射儀 7.向量信號分析儀 8.天線量測
description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 1.無線傳輸技術之效能評估2.GSM系統之分析與模擬3.IS-95 CDMA系統之分析與模擬4.第三代行動通訊系統之分析與模擬5.定位機制之探討6.統計通道模擬7.定點通道模擬
description.en: 1.Performance Evaluation of Wireless Transmission Techniques2.Analysis and Simulation of GSM System3.Analysis and Simulation of IS-95 CDMA System4.Analysis and Simulation of 3G Systems5.Positioning6.Statistic Channel Modeling 7.Sight Specific Channel modeling

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計積体電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路佈局的能力,課程內容包念： 1. SOC設計介紹 2. SOC設計流程與工具 3. 以平台為基礎的SOC設計 4. 軟體應體共同設計 5. SIP設計介紹 6. 嵌入式RTOS 7. 混合模式設計 8. SOC測試與驗證 9. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of advanced FPGA system. Therefore, the student has the design capability of advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction to SOC Design 2. SOC Design Flow & Tools 3. Platforms Based SOC Design 4. Hardware/Software Co-design 5. Introduction to SIP Design 6. Embedded RTOS 7. Mixed-mode Design 8. SOC Testing & Verification 9. Case Study

Design Practice	2.1 Usability paradigms and principles	2.2 The design process	2.3 Models of the user in design	2.4 Task analysis	2.5 Dialogue notations and design	2.6 Models of the system	2.7 Implementation support	2.8 Evaluation techniques	2.9 Online help and documentation3. Advanced Topics	3.1 Groupware	3.2 CSCW issues and theory	3.3 Multi-sensory systems

name.en: Internet of Things and Sensor Networks

description.zh: (1)物聯網概述，(2)物聯網感知層，(3)物聯網網路層，(4)物聯網應用層，(5)物聯網平台與雲端運算，(6)無線感測網路802.15.4與ZigBee，(7)無線感測網路應用，(8) RFID原理與應用，(9) WSNs至IoT，(10)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1) Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT), (2) IoT: Perception Layer, (3) IoT: Network Layer, (4) IoT: Application Layer, (5) IoT Platform and Could Computing, (6) Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs): 802.15.4 and ZigBee, (7) WSN Applications, (8) Principles and Applications of RFID, (9) WSNs to IoT, (10) Recent Advances and Related Research Issues.

description.zh: 先修課程︰冷凍工程、熱力學本課程主要提供一食品冷凍工程學之入門課程，主要闡述︰1. 食品冷凍法概論，各種方法優劣比較。2. 食品熱負荷計算、冷凍設備尺寸大小設計。3. 食品冷藏時間及凍結時間計算。4. 冷凍廠佈置及機具設計。5. 冷凍系統性能計算。6. 水膜及對冷凍系統之影響，冷凍庫相對溫度及表面結露之計算。7. ＣＦＣ問題、立法及其對食品冷凍工業技術之影響。
description.en: Objective: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of refrigeration and on concerning the cold storage of food. The course content encompasses a number of subjects:1. Outline of food refrigeration, the methods of cold storage of food and the advantage and disadvantage of these methods.2. Heat load determination. Plant sizing, and also on monitoring of heat loads to ensure they are minimized, thus minising the costs of refrigeration.3. Chilling time and freezing time of food.4. Refrigeration plant layout and design.5. Operation efficiency of refrigeration system performance.6. Water vapor and its effect on refrigeration system performance. Control of relative humidity and surface condensation.7. CFC issues. Legislation and their impact on the industrial technology of food refrigeration.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 本課程將介紹流體機械設計上之相關理論與其流場行為的分析方法，內容包括流體機械的熱流動力學、翼列間流場理論、軸流式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機)設計與分析、離心式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機) 設計與分析、渦卷式和螺旋式壓縮機設計與分析、電腦輔助流體機械設計。
description.en: This course intends to introduction the design principles of turbomachinery and the methods to analyze the flow behavior. The course contents are: thermo-fluid dynamics aspects of turbomachinery, cascade flow, preliminary design and analysis of xial-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fan), centrifugal-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fans), scroll and screw compressor, the computational aided design of turbomechinery.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 車輛排放之空氣污染物，包括：一氧化碳CO、碳氫化合物HC、氮氧化物NOx、及粒狀污染物之成因分析，探討各項技術，如稀油燃燒、層狀燃燒、均質壓燃(HCCI)、選擇性觸媒(SCR)、電熱觸媒等之發展趨勢，以及因應污染法規之對策。
description.en: Analysis of the exhaust emissions formation from motor vehicles, Such As: carbon monoxide (CO), hydrocarbons (HC), nitrogen oxide (NOx), and particulate matter (PM). To discuss the trend of new technologies, such as: lean burn, stratified charge combustion, homogeneous charge compression ignition, selective catalytic reactor (SCR), electric heated catalytic converter, etc. Evaluating the technology strategy for new emission regulations

notes: 車輛所與碩士在職專班合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 岩石工程是一門應用的課程，它的重點在於把基本的岩石力學的原理，運用在實際的工程問題上，因此，這門課將介紹岩石力學在岩石邊坡、岩石基礎、及岩石隧道上的應用。上課的學生在完成這門課之後，應該對這三大類的問題都有清楚的了解。為了使沒有上過岩石力學的學生也能進入狀況，這門課會先對岩體分類法（如RMR法及Q法）及立體投影圖加以回顧，然後再進行岩石邊坡工程、岩石基礎工程、及岩石隧道工程的介紹。「岩石工程」的課程大綱如下：
description.en: The focus of this course is the application of the basic principles of rock mechanics.  Three types of applications are to be covered in this semester-long course: rock slopes, rock foundations, and rock tunnels.  The students are expected to complete assignments in each of the above three categories.  To prepare students with no previous academic work in rock mechanics, this course will review the classification systems of rock masses (such as the RMR and the Q systems).  Also, the stereographic projection is a required tool, which will be introduced in this course.

name.zh: 進階半導體與光電廠務設施
name.en: Advanced course on facility system of semiconductor and photonic fabrication plants.

description.zh: 本課程為半導體與光電廠務設進階課程, 主要針對半導體與光電廠務設施作深入的論述，課程包含廠務設施的九大系統：冰水機系統、排氣系統、電力監控系統、壓縮空氣系統、氮氣系統、純水系統、真空系統、製程冷卻水系統及外氣空調系統。期使修習本課程之學生有一和實務聯結之機會，並和理論作相相互映證。有校外教學且學生必需完成一小型計劃.
description.en: This advanced course aims to provide students a broad scope of hand-on knowledge on the facility system of a semiconductor or photonic fabrication factory. The facility system includes nine sub-systems: chilled water system, exhaust air system, compressed air system, process cooling water (PCW) system, vacuum system, ultra pure water (UPW) system, power and monitoring system, nitrogen system and make-up air system. Course material is basically based on and closely linked with field operational experience. A factory visit tour will be arranged. A mini-project will be carried by participating students.

description.zh: 本課程中說明如何網路創業，並包括實際操作。
description.en: The course is teaching how to initiate a business on the internet.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

description.zh: 1.基本分析工具介紹(6) 2.基本光學系統--近軸光學(6) 3.光學系統元件介紹(6) 4.像差理論(6) 5.像質評估(6) 6.光學系統設計(6)7.光學套裝軟體使用(6) 8.光電設計專題(9)

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物分子及這些生物分子所扮演的角色。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。再論及DNA複製及轉錄和RNA轉譯成蛋白質的重要性及機制。PCR和DNA重組技術的重要性是安排在最後來介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce a series of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The phenomena of DNA replication and translation, and RNA translation will be studied. The PCR method and DNA recombinant technology also included in this course.

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

description.zh: 1. GPS 的緣起與發展2. GPS 的系統架構3. GPS 的時間與座標4. GPS 的定位原理與觀測量5. GPS 的誤差分析6. GPS 導航定位分法7. GPS 在測量的應用GPS 導航定位實習
description.en: 1. The origin and development of GPS.2. The structure of GPS.3. GPS time and coordination.4. GPS positioning principle and measurements.5. GPS error analysis.6. GPS in navigation.7. GPS in measurement.  8.GPS practice

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: The material in this course covers implantable, nonimplantable, and extracorporeal materials. Implantables include sutures, vascular grafts, artificial heart, artificial bones and ligaments, drug delivery device, artificial tissues, artificial liver,etc. Nonimplantable materials are : cloths in medical uses,  surgical dressings and gauze, injection device, diagonsis materials, etc. Extracorporeal materials are : dialysis fibers, artificial lung, catheters, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

description.zh: 因應高齡化社會的來臨，本課程探討高齡者的健康、住家、行動力、通訊、休閒和工作等議題，以使用者為中心發掘問題，提出改善高齡者生活之產品、環境或服務設計，以達到在地安養的目的。
description.en: To cope with the coming of the aging society, issues about health, housing, mobility, communication, leisure and work for senior citizens are discussed in the class.  User-centred approaches are adopted to explore the difficulties the senior citizens encountered in their daily life.  Product, environment of services designs are proposed to improve the living quality for the senior citizens.  Hopefully, the concept of aging in place will be realized.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

name.zh: 建築施工災害與應變措施
name.en: Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

description.zh: 企業創新與研究是促成經營策略成功之不可或缺的部分。資通訊科技日新月益。現今資訊科技系統已成為企業中的重要部份。本課程的主要目標在廣泛的介紹使用更新進的資訊科技所促成的企業創新。
description.en: Business innovation and research are integral components of business strategy and success. The information & communication technologies (ICTs) advance rapidly. Now, the information technology system has become an essential part of enterprises. The goal of the course is breadth to cover advances in ICTs, with emphasis on enabling business innovation.

name.zh: 計算機在電力系統之應用

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 電力系統簡介3. MATLAB簡介4. 電力潮流分析5. 最佳化調度6. 電力系統故障之研究7. 電力系統穩定度分析
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Power system matrix3. Introduction to MATLAB4. Power flow studies5. optimal Dispatch6. Fault Studies7. Power system stability

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.zh: 雷射醫學的基礎與臨床應用

description.zh: 雷射乃20世紀三大發明之一，醫用雷射更已廣泛地應用在各個醫學領域。本課程將涵蓋的範圍包括：1. 雷射基本原理；2. 雷射安全標準；3. 雷射與組織的作用關係；4. 雷射在醫學的各種應用；5. 雷射於牙周病的應用；6. 雷射於口腔外科的應用；7. 雷射應用於牙齒美白；8. 低能量雷射的各種應用；9. 雷射實機操作與臨床示範。
description.en: The laser is one of the three major items invented in 20th century.  Medical laser applications have been widely used in many fields.  This lecture will cover: 1. Laser Physics; 2. Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. Practical Hands-on and Live Patient Demonstration.

name.zh: CMOS元件量測與可靠度工程
name.en: CMOS Device Measurement and Reliability Engineering

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。課程簡介，材料簡介，量子效應，被動元件，被動元件特性，主動元件，主動元件特性，主動元件參數，元件設計，參數粹取，氧化層可靠性分析，熱載子效應，金屬漂移分析，產品可靠性分析(包括靜電防護)。
description.en: Introduction, semiconductor materials, quantum effect, passive devices, characteristics of passive devices, active devices, characteristics of active devices, parameters of active devices, pattern designs., parameter extraction, oxide reliability analysis, hot carrier effect, metal migration analysis, product reliability analysis (including ESD protection).

name.en: An introduction to sustainable architectural research

description.zh: 本課程主要係針對全球化與國際化時代來臨後，身為地球村的一份子如何整合因對永續建築與環境不同價值觀所帶來之衝擊，並透過客觀研究與實際案例具體提出適切的解決之道，以取得永續建築與環境所存在異同之平衡。課程期望透過引導並激發研究者在面對永續建築與環境之種種議題時，能夠同時尋求人類與建築以及環境三者間共存共榮之最適當方式。學習過程中，研究者除必需提出理論與實務案例做為研究之基礎外，傳授者同時亦將由研究討論過程中了解研究者個別之特質，並依照其不同特質協助研究者建立正確的邏輯思維，以建立建築專業道德與卓越價值觀，以期確實能夠使研究者在精確掌握時代趨勢的前提下，提出符合建築專業研究對於永續建築與環境兩者異同平衡之解決策略與妥善建議，並期望藉由研究能夠更進一步獲得社會對於建築專業研究之認同，最終達到永續建築與環境平衡之目標。
description.en: This course targeting mainly after the era of globalization and internationalization, who is a member of the global village how to integration for sustainable construction and environmental impact of the different values, and through objective research and the case specifying the appropriate solutions, in order to achieve sustainable architectural and environmental similarities and differences that exist in balance. Courses through guided and inspired researchers in when confronted with various issues of sustainable architecture and environment, while seeking human and architectural and environmental coexistence and common prosperity among the three most appropriate manners. Learning process in the, researchers except required made theory and practice case do for research of based outside, taught who while also will by research discussion process in the understanding researchers individual of trait, and pursuant to its different trait assist researchers established correctly of logical

description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 企業在營運理念上，著重的即是符合市場導向並重視顧客，幫助經理人去設計一套通盤考量的行銷企畫，並且以顧客為導向。而這樣的課程設計，將使你增加專業行銷知識，也幫助你在做決策時更有信心，降低決策失誤的機率。藉由此研討方式預期將增進你組織的行銷效率與成果之改善。此課程也讓幫助你了解以下之概念：行銷管理之概念 、行銷系統與環境 此課程將幫助不論是否在行銷領域中發展的經理人，使他們重新審視、其行銷或顧客服務和產品發展策略，並在新的競爭市場中獲利。藉由課堂的參予學習，與同學的交流研討也將激發不同的思維與學習動力。
description.en: Enterprises operating in the concept, which is in line with the emphasis on market-oriented and the importance of customers and help managers to design a comprehensive marketing the planning considerations, and customer-oriented. Such a curriculum design, you will increase the professional marketing knowledge, but also help you in making decisions, more confidence, and reducing the probability of mistakes in decision making. By the way discussions are expected to enhance the efficiency of your marketing.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     創新設計之意涵，創新設計之方法，創新設計之個案研究，智慧財產權之維護。
description.en: Meaning of Creative Design, Methods of Creative Design, Case study of Creative Design,      Protection of Intellectual Properties.

description.zh: 電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
description.en: The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

name.zh: 第二語言習得專題討論

description.zh: 本課程將對第二語言習得的主要議題進行深入地探討論與分析。上課的內容包括，但不限於，下列主題: 語言天賦、跨語言影響、人格特質、學習動機、學習風格、學習策略、外語焦慮和外語學習信念等。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of selected issues and problems in second language acquisition. The topics covered in this course include, but are not limited to, the following: language aptitude, cross-linguistic influences, personality, motivation, leaning styles, learning strategies, language anxiety, and learners' beliefs.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討些最近發展之最佳化方法如模擬退火法，類種經網路，基因法則及塔布搜尋等。此外，相關之文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study some new optimization methodologies,like simulated aunealing, neural networks,genetic algorithm, and Tabu search. Becises, the related literature reviews and applications areas wii be focused.

description.zh: 本堂課邀請元大寶來期貨、證券及財富管理各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財報分析選股、期權商品策略介紹及交易實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en: This class is going to invite investment experts from Yuanta Futures and Yuanta Securities to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

notes: 經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 引導學生觀察及掌握不同產業的技術與市場發展趨勢，培養學生對於產業技術及市場之前瞻思考能力，協助學生整合產業趨勢及市場前瞻相關領域的專業知識，有助於學生儘早熟悉產業生態，提高其就業競爭力。
description.en: To guide students in observing and handling the different industry and market trends, training students for industry technology and foresights, to helps students consolidate expertise in areas related to industry trends and market perspectives. This course will help students as early as possible familiar with the industry, to improve their employability.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-全球商業脈動
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Global Business Trends

description.zh: 本課程藉由臺灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業國際品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以臺灣企業品牌之實際案例，讓臺灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，更能進一步追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野與思維。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務業的行銷與管理，主要內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務業創新（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）service innovation, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）service pricing.

description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

name.zh: 企業講座-經營管理之道

description.zh: 本課程主旨在介紹一個企業集團如何創業、擴充事業版圖、多角化經營。企業永續成長與經營的目標，端賴於管理階層具有前瞻性地視野、敏銳的策略規劃、健全的管理制度與人力資源充分有效的發揮。課程進行是以演講的方式介紹該企業之經營管理情形，讓同學們得以一窺業界實務工作的全貌，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。
description.en: The goals of perpetual management and growth of an enterprise are depend upon the top level of vision, lean thinking and strategy planning, organization system integration, and manpower resource effective utilization. The objective of this course is to introduce the practice application and manage a business group.

notes: ABC共3節，6週經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開限100人

description.zh: 由於無線通信相較於有線通信，具備有可容納更多頻道，遠距傳輸損耗較低且較不受地物影響之優勢，使得無線通信變成目前世界上發展最為快速之工程技術之一。如無線區域通信網路(WLAN)；無線寬頻通信網路(WCDMA)；移動無線通信(Mobile Com）等。其中微波通信，則為無線通信之實際核心技術，並決定無線通信系統許多參數及性能。其主要部分含有微波輻射場形，收發系統，波形調變架構等。因而本課程之目的在於配合現今及未來工程技術之發展，提供在無線通信系統領域中，重要微波通信工程之基礎概念，可為有興趣於無線通信工程之學生，建立有效且實際之系統工程概念及系統設計之基礎。
description.en: Due to advantages in accommodating larger capacity of individual information channels, less path loss for long didtance link communication has rapidly expanded throughout the world in recent year. Such as WLAN, WCDMA and Mobile communications etc. Therefore, the object of this course is to provide the crucial background knowledge for microwave link concept, architecture and processing. Major parts of this course will be emphasized on the region of system level rather than go into detailed component questions. Thus, it is perhaps more suitable for senior or graduate students.

notes: 電資國際專班與電子所合開

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學

description.zh: 在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

description.en: This course is designed to enhance students’ competition and ability in the workplace. The course contains some subjects including tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career etc. By these topics, students will have variety of skills about interview and management that needed in the workplace to raise employment rate.

notes: ABC節，6週，校級課程與最後一哩合開，限60人

description.zh: 介紹審計準則與查核報告、職業道德、專業責任的保持：查核人員的監管和法律責任、審計證據、審計業務承接、內部控制、資訊科技環境下的審計、審計抽樣的應、查核工作底稿、收入循環、採購支出及付款循環等。 本課程參考最新國際準則公報並依照現行教學及考試方向調整原有架構之外，更針對鑑識審計、公司治理、審計業務承接、查帳和客戶之間的關係、風險評估以及資訊科技環境下的審計等做了更多的著墨，而近更動之審計公報也於本版一併進行更新，以求更符合趨勢。
description.en: Introduction auditing standards and audit report, maintaining professional ethics, professional responsibility: the regulatory and legal responsibility to check personnel, audit evidence, audit business undertaking, internal control, information technology audit environment, audit sampling should be to check the working papers, income circulation, procurement spending and payment cycle and so on. The course reference to the latest international standards and adjust the original architecture communique teaching and examination in accordance with current direction, it is more for the forensic audit, corporate governance, auditing business undertaking, under the audit and the relationship between the customer, risk assessment and information technology environment audit done more inked, and audit bulletin of recent changes in this edition also be updated in order to be more consistent with the trend.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意本課程利用要徑法教導學生管理一項專案有關時間及成本的估計，進度表，預算編列等技巧，及其它監督控制一項專案進行之措施。專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。課程內容包含：（1）專案的定義和辨認，（2）專案可行性研究和選擇條件，（3）專案進度表編排，（4）專案之預算與成本控制，（5）限制性資源之編排與調配，（6）專案評核與檢討技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the technique of Critical Path Method (CPM) to manage a project in terms of time / cost estimation, scheduling, budgeting, and other control / monitoring measures on the performance of a project. The role of project manager in an organization will also be discussed. Topics to be covered are: (1) Concept and identification of a project, (2) Project feasibility study and selection criteria, (3) Project scheduling, (4) Budgeting and cost control, (5) Constrained resource scheduling and leveling, and (6) Project evaluation and review technique.

description.zh: 本課程主要分成三部分。第一部分介紹工業機器人的結構，分類和其工作空間等基礎。第二部分介紹機器人的端效器、語言指令及其控制系統和安全。最後再介紹機器人如何與系統相整合，以執行功能性的製造單元(或製造系統)。
description.en: This course basically is composed of 3 parts. First, configuration, classification and work cell of the industrial robots will be introduced. Secondary, end-of-tooling, programming & instruction, control system controller and safety is covered. Finally, the robot and system integration to execute a functional manufacturing cell (or system) will be provided.

name.zh: 眾所必讀的經典故事1: 喬瑟與莎
name.en: Classic Stories Everybody Should Know 1: Chaucer and Shakespeare

description.zh: 西方文化的交流是建立在故事上的。即使這些故事相當久遠，但每個人卻都非常熟悉，又或者是因為這些故事相當久遠，所以每個人都非常熟悉。本課程將探討近代主要西方作家—喬瑟及莎士比亞—作品中的核心主題及文化的意象。研讀這些近代西方主要作家的作品是發展西方文學素養及思想的基石，同時，也為任何概括了以西方文化為主體的研究提供了不可或缺的背景知識。
description.en: Conversation in Western culture is built on stories. Everybody knows the stories even though the stories are very old, or rather everybody knows them because they are very old stories. This course introduces students to central thematic and cultural ideas in the major writers of the early modern period, Chaucer and Shakespeare. Read closely by the major writers of later periods, these works are the foundation of modern English literature and western thought. They also provide essential background knowledge for any graduate study of western culture in general.

name.en: Special topics of modern manufacturing technology

description.zh: 介紹最新製造技術中的特殊項目，包括：1、製造實驗及統計分析2、製造設備，強調電腦化的運動控制及製程控制3、電腦化的製造系統，如CAD、CAM、CIM、LAN及因電腦化產生的系統進化。
description.en: Introducing special topics of newest manufacturing technology. Including:1.Manufacturing experiments and statistical evaluation.2.Manufacturing equipment, emphasizing on computerized motion control and process control.3.Computerized manufacturing system, like CAD, CAM, CIM, LAN, and manufacturing system 's evolution due to computerization.

name.en: Special topics of modern manufacturing technology

description.zh: 介紹最新製造技術中的特殊項目，包括：1、製造實驗及統計分析2、製造設備，強調電腦化的運動控制及製程控制3、電腦化的製造系統，如CAD、CAM、CIM、LAN及因電腦化產生的系統進化。
description.en: Introducing special topics of newest manufacturing technology. Including:1.Manufacturing experiments and statistical evaluation.2.Manufacturing equipment, emphasizing on computerized motion control and process control.3.Computerized manufacturing system, like CAD, CAM, CIM, LAN, and manufacturing system 's evolution due to computerization.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 導論及AI之工業應用、類神經網路及專家系統搜尋法則、敘述邏輯、驗證、機器學習。
description.en: Introduction of AI in industrial applications, Neural Networks, Searching algorithm of expert systems, Statement logic, Testing, Machine learning.

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.
